content: as written for small size only work pattern for medium size but cast on 68 sts and work to only 6 before crown decreases begin decreases with one round of *k15 k2tog repeat from * around to get to 64 sts knit or purl 1 round/row continue decreases with *k6 k2tog instruction for medium size & follow rest of decreases as written for large size only work pattern for medium size but cast on 80 sts and work to 7 before crown decreases begin decreases with *k8 k2tog repeat from * around across 72 sts knit 1 round plain if working circularly - or - purl 1 row plain if knitting flat continue with *k7 k2tog instruction for medium size & follow rest of decreases as written copyright 2017 2004 revised 2009 2013 kathy north -- www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not reproduce pattern for commercial purposes 3
